channel.title: redis on Spade Three
channel.description: Recent content in redis on Spade Three

item.title: Php Redis
item.description: php connect $host='127.0.0.1'; $port='6389'; $password='pass'; $redis=new \Redis(); $redis->connect($host,$port,100); //$redis->auth($password); $redis->select(0); cache $redis->set("abc",100); $timeout=10; $redis->set("abc",100,$timeout); $val=$redis->get('abc'); queue // 队列入 $redis->lPush("abc_list","ck1"); $redis->lPush("abc_list","ck2"); //队列出. $val=$redis->rPop("abc_list"); //防超时 守护进程 出队列设计 $dbConn=false; while (true) { $key='xxx'; try { while ($val = $redis->rPop($key)) { if($dbConn){ //close db //open db $dbConn=false; } #code... } }catch (\Exception $e){ #code... # retry data $redis->rPush("$key",$val); } sleep(5); $dbConn=true; } gis cli //add 地理位置坐标 geoadd cities:locations 113.332406 23.
